query.queryString: (/article/relations/categories/collection/code='resultsPack,projectsInfoPack,brief' OR (/result/relations/categories/collection/code='deliverable,publication' OR contenttype='project')) AND ('SUSTAINABILITY' OR 'INNOVATION' OR 'MULTI-CRITERIA')

result.title: CFD modelling of mass transfer during sc-drying process, and concept for drying optimization on the pilot and production scale
result.description: Development of a mathematical description of the production of organic microstructured nanohybrid aerogels using tools and techniques of computational fluid dynamics (CFD). The model will then be used to asses process parameters for optimization.
